levels.description: After deployment, immediately gains <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> Physical Dodge and a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> that can absorb Physical damage equal to <@ba.vup>{hp_ratio:0%}</> of this unit's Max HP, lasting for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds
